name: Copykat
description:
A magical girl is lost in a small world with almost no memories of her past. She must travel through a set of mirrors to find out where she is and why.

(Downloadable version of the game is available for Mac and Windows below)

Unfortunately, due to a lack of time, only a demo of the game is available for now. Despite this, we hope you enjoy our little game.

A full version of the game is planned to be released in the coming weeks. 

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys for movement

"A" to interact with object

"Left Click" to move around puzzle pieces

"Right Click" to rotate puzzle pieces
